abstract: Juan Martin del Potro, who has returned to play after wrist surgery, defeats Guido Pella in first round of Miami Open; faces Roger Federer in second-round match.

headline.main: Juan Martín del Potro Advances at Miami Open

snippet: Juan Martín del Potro, only three events into his comeback from left wrist surgery, has booked a second-round date with Roger Federer at the Miami Open.
lead_paragraph: Juan Martín del Potro, only three events into his comeback from left wrist surgery, has booked a second-round date with Roger Federer at the Miami Open.
